alert.note: Alert for Logan County; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 11 at 11:09AM MDT until October 13 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Limon, Southern Lincoln County, Sterling, Akron, Julesburg, and Holyoke. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
